summary: mm: slub: fix flush_cpu_slab()/__free_slab() invocations in task context.
details:
mm: slub: fix flush_cpu_slab()/__free_slab() invocations in task context.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0 by commit e45cc288724f0cfd497bb5920bcfa60caa335729, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 5a836bf6b09f99ead1b69457ff39ab3011ece57b. For more details please see the references link.
